bug.author: PFpengfeng
bug.summary: Exception in thread beam_control_read and grpc.RpcError
bug.description: When running the pipeline example <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfx/blob/master/tfx/examples/mnist/mnist_pipeline_native_keras.py>mnist_pipeline_native_keras.py</denchmark-link> . I get a Exception like the figure below. I feel confused because I ran it successfully several days ago. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57736376/87866591-49f14180-c9b6-11ea-9c33-13931b6772d0.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: What version? and is this local run?

Yeahï¼Œit's local run. I used python3.6. And some librarys used is below. tensorflow 2.2.0 tfx 0.22 tensorflow-data-validation 0.22.2 tensorflow-estimator 1.15.1 tensorflow-metadata 0.22.2 tensorflow-model-analysis 0.22.2 tensorflow-serving-api 2.2.0 tensorflow-transform 0.22.0 grpcio 1.30.0 grpcio-gcp 0.2.2 grpcio-tools 1.30.0 protobuf 3.12.2 absl-py 0.9.0 apache-beam 2.22.0
